properties.description: Notebook to create the PBI view of contract data

source:
%%sql

CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW odw_curated_db.vw_mipins_hr_contract

AS

SELECT DISTINCT

CASE 
    WHEN ContractCode = 'AG' THEN '1'
    WHEN ContractCode = 'AP' THEN '2'
    WHEN ContractCode = 'CO' THEN '3'
    WHEN ContractCode = 'CT' THEN '4'
    WHEN ContractCode = 'FT' THEN '5'
    WHEN ContractCode = 'LP' THEN '6'      
    WHEN ContractCode = 'LU' THEN '7'  
    WHEN ContractCode = 'MG' THEN '8'    
    WHEN ContractCode = 'NE' THEN '9'      
    WHEN ContractCode = 'NO' THEN '10'  
    WHEN ContractCode = 'NS' THEN '11'    
    WHEN ContractCode = 'PE' THEN '12'      
    WHEN ContractCode = 'SP' THEN '13'
    WHEN ContractCode = 'SU' THEN '14'
    ELSE 'UNKNOWN'
END                 AS dim_work_contract_key,
ContractCode        AS WorkContractCode,
Description         AS WorkContractDesc
--IsActive            AS IsActive,
--IngestionDate       AS IngestionDate,
--ValidTo             AS ValidTo

FROM odw_harmonised_db.hr_contract_dim

ORDER BY 1 DESC

%%sql
create or replace table odw_curated_db.mipins_hr_contract
using delta
as
SELECT * FROM odw_curated_db.vw_mipins_hr_contract
